thread.title: VICKI NEWBY
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by VICKI NEWBY

author: VICKI NEWBY
title: VICKI NEWBY
text: I've been infatuated with early season solitary bees (like the humble Mason Bee) for a while now, so when I saw Brushy Mountain on the internet, I studied up on how to serve (and how to be served by) such creatures as the Mason Bee. I had a question first, which they answered quickly and well, and then I ordered the Large Mason Bee Kit. I've already hung the house outside in the most appropriate location on my property, holding the cocoons themselves in the 'fridge until we're past the danger of frost. I am so pleased and look forward eagerly to the coming season. Thank you Brushy Mountain!
